import React from"react";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Tooltip,Legend}from"chart.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Tooltip,Legend);const MetricChart=_ref=>{let{title,dataPoints,label}=_ref;const labels=dataPoints.map(dp=>new Date(dp.timestamp*1000).toLocaleTimeString());const data={labels,datasets:[{label,data:dataPoints.map(dp=>dp.value),fill:false,tension:0.3}]};const options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{display:true}},scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"metric-chart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:options})]});};export default MetricChart;
